org.enhydra.shark.api.internal.working

Interface TxSynchronization


  • public interface TxSynchronization
    Since Shark tends to be a transaction oriented, this is the interface that the kernel uses to signal operations on the transaction.
    Author:
    Sasa Bojanic, Vladimir Puskas
